about.description:
Beartype is an open-source PEP-compliant near-real-time pure-Python runtime
type checker emphasizing efficiency, usability, and thrilling puns.
about.summary: Unbearably fast near-real-time hybrid runtime-static type-checking. Unbearably fast runtime type checking in pure Python.

about.description:
Beartype is an open-source PEP-compliant near-real-time pure-Python runtime
type checker emphasizing efficiency, usability, and thrilling puns.
about.summary: Unbearably fast near-real-time hybrid runtime-static type-checking. Unbearably fast runtime type checking in pure Python.

name: beartype
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "beartype" %}
{% set version = "0.18.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "aa254f7cf87eea6cdd329f488b5d8282f6f30befe496fbbcd844d92ede6e6f23" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.8
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >=3.8

test:
  requires:
    - pytest
  source_files:
    - conftest.py
    - beartype_test
  commands:
    - pytest beartype_test

about:
  home: https://github.com/beartype/beartype
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Unbearably fast near-real-time hybrid runtime-static type-checking. Unbearably fast runtime type checking in pure Python.
  description: |
    Beartype is an open-source PEP-compliant near-real-time pure-Python runtime
    type checker emphasizing efficiency, usability, and thrilling puns.
  doc_url: https://beartype.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/beartype/beartype

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - leycec
